string.name: watering_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered. Used in combination with watering_needs_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, singular. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every day'.
Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, plural. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every 8 days'.
Text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, singular. Used in conjunction with last watered date. 'May 24, 2018 - water tomorrow.'.
Text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, plural. Used in conjunction with last watered date. 'May 24, 2018 - water in 8 days.'.

string.name: a11y_plant_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the plant images shown in the 'My garden' and 'Plant list' screens.

string.name: my_garden_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My garden' screen where the user can see the list of plants that have been added to their garden.

string.name: plant_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant list screen where the user can see a list of plants available to add to their garden.

string.name: share_text_plant
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a plant on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s plant in the Android Sunflower app
